text: "I'm Down" is a 1965 song by The Beatles as the B-side to their hit single Help!. It was released in July 1965 as a non-album single. It was covered by the Beastie Boys for their 1986 debut studio album Licensed to Ill and by Aerosmith for their ninth studio album Permanent Vacation. Category:The Beatles songs Category:1965 songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: I'm Down
